actions.committee: House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs)
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on International Relations (Subsequently: Foreign Affairs).

official_title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969 to prohibit exporting to Uganda of goods subject to control under that Act.

summary.text: Amends the Export Administration Act of 1969 to prohibit the export to Uganda of articles, materials, or supplies controlled pursuant to such Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Export Administration Act of 1969 to prohibit exporting to Uganda of goods subject to control under that Act.
